## tableMenuCommand() function

Displays a table name along with a dropdown menu for selection of different tables.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function tableMenuCommand(tables: TableContainer[], selectedKey?: string | undefined, onChange?: (id: string) => void, props?: Partial<ICommandBarItemProps>): ICommandBarItemProps;
```
